mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart( userInfo_id, product_id, stock) VALUES ( #{cartDto.userInfoId}, #{cartDto.productId}, #{cartDto.stock} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, p.id as 'productId', p.name, p.price, c.stock, p.price * c.stock as 'totalPrice' FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON p.id = c.product_id INNER JOIN userInfo u ON p.userInfo_id = u.id WHERE u.email = #{email}
